original: intros l x c e HIn HeClient. induction l as [| e' l' IHl']. -- simpl in HIn. contradiction. -- simpl in HIn. destruct HIn as [HIn_eq | HIn_tail]. ++ subst e'. simpl. destruct (clientId_eq_dec c (eClient e)) as [Heq | Hneq]. ** simpl. rewrite HeClient in Heq. rewrite Heq. apply Nat.le_max_l. ** exfalso. apply Hneq. symmetry. auto. ++ simpl. destruct (clientId_eq_dec c (eClient e')) as [Heq | Hneq]. ** simpl. specialize (IHl' HIn_tail HeClient). apply Nat.le_trans with (m := max_id_for_client_default (Init.Nat.max x (eId e')) c l'). --- apply IHl'. --- apply Nat.le_max_r. ** apply IHl'. auto.
